title: How to find out what instruments are used in a song played by an orchestra - Quora

response.answer_text: In addition to what Mr. Hagelbarger writes, you might want to examine the musical score, which will provide a list of instruments. Of course, there is the old-fashioned way: listen to the piece. One more thing (and it’s my pet peeve): by definition, a “song” has lyrics.

You could look up the piece online. Many pieces have their instrumentations listed somewhere, whether on the Wikipedia entry, or the publisher’s website. However, if it’s not a classical piece, if it’s an arrangement of a pop song or a movie score or something similar, that information may not be out there.
